author: Ross Johnson
title: 9 Roles That Revealed Bob Saget's Filthy Sense of Humor
text: As beloved ‘80s/’90s sitcom dad Danny Tanner, Bob Saget dispensed wholesome wisdom with a smile, soaking in the “awwwws” from an audience who loved and appreciated the gentle hijinks of the Full House family. During the same era, he hosted America’s Funniest …
